text: Erin Skidds 13010 Ridgeline Blvd APT 3111 Cedar Park, TX 78613 erin.skidds@gmail.com 904-994-3588 October 29, 2024 Hiring Manager KL&A Dear Hiring Manager, I am excited to apply for the Software Engineer position at KL&A. With a decade of experience as a front-end developer and four years as a full-stack developer, I bring a comprehensive background in web technologies and a proven track record of crafting innovative and efficient solutions. I am particularly drawn to KL&A’s commitment to employee growth, flexibility, and excellence in client satisfaction, as well as your consistent recognition as a Top Workplace by the Detroit Free Press. Throughout my career, I have developed advanced web applications, focusing on JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and frameworks like Angular and React to deliver responsive, user-centric front-end experiences. My experience extends to back-end technologies, where I have utilized .NET, MySQL, and RESTful APIs to create scalable and robust applications. My approach prioritizes clean, reusable code and a collaborative spirit, ensuring the software solutions I develop align seamlessly with business goals and user needs. I am energized by the opportunity to contribute to KL&A’s mission of delivering outstanding IT consulting and software solutions. My goal is to bring my technical expertise, creative problem-solving skills, and commitment to high-quality software to KL&A’s development team. I look forward to the opportunity to work in an agile, forward-thinking environment that values innovation, professional growth, and collaboration. Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to discussing how my background and skills align with the goals of KL&A. Warm regards, Erin Skidds
